title: Scrubbers (1983) DvDrip.Avi
description:
IT'S A CRIME WHAT PRISON CAN DO TO A GIRL!

In this gritty drama two girls trying to survive in an English borstal (all girl youth prison) will try to escape  for two very different reasons; Annetta to attempt to visit her baby daughter, who is being raised in a convent; and Carol, who hopes to be recaptured and sent to a closed borstal where she knows her girlfriend Doreen is being held.

Filmed in Surrey, England, this movie may be hard to find as I have seen it requested on a few sites.

NOTE: You may have some trouble understanding parts of the dialouge (working-class British accents, local swearwords and UK-prison jive).
